item.title: VMware Event Broker Appliance - vSphere HA Event Notification Function
item.author: Author
item.description: CCC When you’ve read through this short post and you feel encouraged to take a step beyond your comfort zone, then this post and my intention reached its goal. Community I recently had the pleasure to suppport a really cool guy out of the #VEBA Slack Community, his name is Bob, with his function example contribution to the VMware Event Broker project. On a remote session late at night, at least it was for me due to the different timezones CET ðŸŒ• and EST â˜€, Bob introduced his Powershell/ PowerCLI function to me and I was immediately thrilled about what the Æ’(x) does.
